psha.tt.target_menu: VRCEmote menu to customize. Leave empty to auto detect at build time.
psha.tt.emote_name: Name displayed in the VRC Emote menu.
psha.tt.menu_icon: Icon displayed in the VRC Emote menu.
psha.tt.type: Control type. None keeps the existing type.
psha.tt.avatar_action_layer: Avatar Action layer controller. If empty, uses the descriptor default.
psha.tt.me_action_layer: ME Action template controller to merge.
psha.tt.me_fx_layer: ME FX template controller to merge.
psha.tt.start_action_state: State name where the emote branch starts in the Action layer.
psha.tt.end_action_state: State name where the emote branch ends in the Action layer.
psha.tt.track_action_sub_sm: Automatically track merge scope by Start/End and VRCEmote conditions.
psha.tt.action_sub_sm_root: Sub state machine name/path used as the merge scope.
psha.tt.me_write_defaults_off: Force Write Defaults OFF for states inside ME layers.
psha.tt.additional_me_fx: Merge additional ME FX layers (up to 2).
psha.tt.replace_me_menu_icon: Replace the VRC Emote menu icon with the ME icon.
psha.name: Name
psha.err_menu_icon_non_asset:
Menu Icon will not be included in build.
Assign a Texture2D asset.
psha.err_menu_icon_will_fail_validation: Menu Icon import settings will fail VRC validation. ({0})
psha.icon_issue_non_asset: Icon is not an asset reference
psha.action_sub_sm_root_empty_warn: Action Sub StateMachine Root is empty. Click 'Setup VRC Emote' or enter the Action Sub StateMachine Root.
psha.additional_fx_perf_info:
Using multiple FX layers can negatively impact avatar animation performance and optimization.
Use additional ME FX layers only when necessary.
psha.replace_me_menu_icon_tt: Replace the VRC Emote menu icon with the ME icon.
psha.warn_need_descriptor:
For this component to work correctly, it must be placed under the avatar GameObject that has a VRCAvatarDescriptor.
Move this object under the avatar root (the GameObject with the descriptor).
psha.warn_name_mismatch:
The emote name does not match the GameObject name.
Results may differ when using ME FX layers.
Click 'Setup VRC Emote' or make the names match.
psha.no_descriptor_short: Could not find a parent VRCAvatarDescriptor.
psha.menu_empty: The avatar Expressions Menu is empty.
psha.preview_no_menu: Target VRC emote menu is empty, and the emote menu could not be auto detected on the avatar.
psha.preview_target_no_controls: The target VRC emote menu has no controls.
psha.preview_menu_no_controls: The preview menu has no controls.
psha.preview_no_installers: There are no active PshaVRCEmoteInstaller components, so there is nothing to preview.
psha.preview_auto_detected: Auto detected emote menu for preview: {0}
psha.dialog_no_descriptor:
Could not find a parent VRCAvatarDescriptor.
Make sure this object is placed under the avatar root.
psha.dialog_menu_not_assigned: The avatar Expressions Menu is not assigned.
psha.dialog_failed_auto_detect_menu:
Failed to auto detect the emote menu.
Please assign the target VRC emote menu manually.
psha.action_sub_sm_root_invalid_err:
The specified Action SM Root is invalid for the current Action controller.
Please press 'Setup VRC Emote' or set a valid Action SM root.
psha.action_sub_sm_root_invalid_err_defa: For Default/empty Action layer, Action SM Root is assumed to be 'Action'.
psha.err_action_layer_missing_root: Could not read Action layer root StateMachine from the descriptor controller.
psha.err_action_states_invalid: Start/End Action State values are invalid for the current Action controller/scope.
psha.err_start_end_parent_mismatch: Start/End Action States must be under the same parent StateMachine (within the selected scope).
psha.warn_anim_layer_mismatch:
Avatar Action/FX layer reference does not match this avatar (or the asset is missing).
Click 'Setup VRC Emote' or clear the fields to use the descriptor layers.
psha.warn_target_menu_mismatch:
Target VRC Emote Menu does not belong to this avatar (or the asset is missing).
Click 'Setup VRC Emote' or clear the field to use auto-detect.
